title: How to Become a Known Drag Queen in Your Area

steps.headline: As best as you can, try to master the art of female impersonation.
steps.description: Even if you would rather be loud and campy, it is helpful to understand the female form, the beauty of makeup, the essence of matching, and the art of quick thinking (trust me, you will need it).

steps.headline: Decide for yourself--A.S.A.P--whether or not you would like to be a camp queen or a glam queen.
steps.description: Your audience, if at all versed in the world of drag, will judge/appreciate you accordingly.

steps.headline: Put a look together, and make it a good one!
steps.description: Drag Queens are prized for their audacious appearances, whilst others are considered legends for simply being beautiful and exotic 24/7. It is best to check out other drag queens to insure that you will be *unique* instead just run-of-the-mill (it's still one SUPER twisted mill).

steps.headline: Find out if there are any gay bars in your area that host drag shows, and go to a few.
steps.description: If you get the chance, get to know some of the performers; they can clue you in on the other performers, the club, the owner(s), the usual audience, and what the club is looking for.

steps.headline: Start showing up at different venues in drag and take in the reactions you get.
steps.description: Try to get a spot in something small, like a talent show or a parade. Then, get as many bookings as you can and really build an audience for yourself, even if it is small.

steps.headline: Take it anywhere you'd like!
steps.description: People like RuPaul and Divine became famous because of their ability to act and entertain when dressed in drag. If you work hard and fine-tune your act, you could be the world's next biggest drag queen.

Then, get as many bookings as you can and really build an audience for yourself, even if it is small. Take it anywhere you'd like! People like RuPaul and Divine became famous because of their ability to act and entertain when dressed in drag. If you work hard and fine-tune your act, you could be the world's next biggest drag queen.
